Name: Apocalypse: Legacy Edition
About the game: Note - This page is for the legacy version of apocalypse and is outdated. For a better experience, check out the apocalypse: 2.0 edition, completely free to play! (Coming soon) Apocalypse: Legacy Edition is a fast-paced single player shooter. Completely focusing on wave based survival, with all of the latest graphics technologies integrated together, such as Physx 3, Unity 2018, and the Vulkan API! With workshop support for additional content. Since our last update, 1.7, we've improved every area of the title with fixes, improvements and additional features. Including all the content that inspired the remaster, Apocalypse: 2.0 Edition! Featuring new maps, visuals, content and a completely new engine. Many thanks for checking out apocalypse's Steam page, don't forget to have a look at our twitter account, our new feed, or the community hub for updates (discontinued). Note 1 - 'Apocalypse: Legacy Edition' is often referred to as 'Apocalypse' above.
